---
title: "Image Report"
format:
  html:
    self-contained: true
execute:
  echo: false
---
```{r}
#| results: asis

img_files <- list.files("images", pattern = "\\.png$", full.names = TRUE)

for (img in img_files) {
  cat(sprintf("## %s\n\n", basename(img)))
  cat(sprintf("![%s](%s)\n\n", basename(img), img))
}
```
